Subject: Reaction Path Diagram and Movies

Hi everybody, I am using Cantera and I have written a
small program that recall the subroutine rnxpath.py.
In such a way I am able to build reaction path
diagrams at any second of the simulation of a CSTR
reactor post-processing the output files with
Graphviz. I would like to know if it is possible to
build movies in order to see the evolution of the
oxidation process as function of time. 
The problem is that when I postprocess the output
files the reaction path diagram structures appear
different as function of the time, reactions and
species involved during the evolution of the process,
thus it is not possible to see the same structure in
all the files processed by means of Graphviz.
Therefore I can not build movies.
Is there someone that can give me some suggestions to
solve this problem?
